title: Two sides of the river
creator_credit: Brian Carson and Victoria. Ministry of Education
brief_description: The port of Echuca was once Australia’s largest inland port along the Murray River. This program looks briefly at life on the river in the early days and at the tourist attraction that the river and its boats have become.
creator_credit_for_label: Brian Carson and Victoria. Ministry of Education
